Containers.Name: Processing
Containers.Description: [b]This container moves and categorizes MP3/MKV/EPUB/PDF-Files from[br] subfolders $DOWNLOADED to $PROCESSED of /downloads[br][/b] [br] These are defined by Environment Variables (defaults should give you an idea):[br] [br] [b]$DOWNLOADED[/b][br] The subfolder of /downloads where your downloads reside[br][br] [b]$PROCESSED[/b][br] The subfolder of /downloads to output files when processing[br][br] [b]$MKVTAG[/b][br] All MKV's Title/Video/Audio1/Audio2/Audio3-Tags are set to this[br][br] [b]$LANGUAGE[/b][br] 2-letter language code used for sorting Movies/Shows[br][br] [b]$MUSIC[/b][br] The subfolder MP3s are put into[br][br] [b]$EBOOKS[/b][br] The subfolder EPUBs are put into[br][br] [b]$MAGAZINES[/b][br] The subfolder PDFs are put into[br][br] [b]$SHOWS[/b][br] The subfolder MKVs of shows/anime are put into (with quality appended)[br][br] [b]$HSBS[/b][br] The subfolder MKVs of 3D movies are put into (with year of release and 3D.H-SBS appended)[br][br] [b]$MOVIES[/b][br] The subfolder MKVs of movies are put into (with year of release appended)[br][br] [b]$DRONE[/b][br] MKVs in this subfolder of /downloads are Tagged, then Moved to its equivalent in /processing for Sonarr to pick up[br][br] [br] The container runs headlessly and stops automatically.[br] [br] Use with care! Only let it lose on your Files if you fully understand the consequences![br] [br] chmod -R 775 is run on /downloads[br] [br] SRT/SUB/IDX/M3U/URL-Files are considered Clutter and will be deleted from /downloads[br] [br] This container is based on smdion/docker-nginx/ and uses mkvtoolnix for Tagging/Filebot for sorting media
